com.reimaginebanking.api.nessieandroidsdk.requestclients

Class BillClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.reimaginebanking.api.nessieandroidsdk.requestclients.BillClient

  • public class BillClient
extends java.lang.Object
    A Client singleton object that provides methods for all Bill endpoints.
